summary.para: Gets the boolean value of a specified property key.

param.name: pf
param.para: A pointer to a boolean value.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the class identifier (CLSID) value of specified property key.

param.name: pclsid
param.para: A pointer to a CLSID value.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the date and time value of a specified property key.

param.name: pft
param.para: A pointer to a date and time value.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the Int32 value of specified property key.

param.name: pi
param.para: A pointer to an Int32 value.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets a structure from a specified property key.

param.name: ppropvar
param.para: Contains a pointer to a structure.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets a property description list object given a reference to a property key.

param.name: riid
param.para: A reference to a desired IID.

param.name: ppv
param.para: Contains the address of an interface pointer.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets a property store object for specified property store flags.

param.name: flags
param.para: The constants that modify the property store object.

param.name: riid
param.para: A reference to the IID of the object to be retrieved.

param.name: ppv
param.para: When this method returns, contains the address of an interface pointer.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Note When this method is called on a property store for a file, that file is held open for the lifetime of the object.

summary.para: Gets property store object for specified property keys.

param.name: rgKeys
param.para: A pointer to an array of structures. Each structure contains a unique identifier for each property used in creating the property store.

param.name: cKeys
param.para: The number of structures in the array pointed to by rgKeys.

param.name: flags
param.para: The constants that modify the property store object.

param.name: riid
param.para: A reference to the IID of the object to be retrieved.

param.name: ppv
param.para: When this method returns, contains the address of an interface pointer.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Note When this method is called on a property store for a file, that file is held open for the lifetime of the object.

summary.para: Uses the specified instead of to create an instance of the property handler associated with the Shell item on which this method is called. Most calling applications do not need to call this method, and can call instead.

param.name: flags
param.para: The constants that modify the property store object.

param.name: punkCreateObject
param.para: A pointer to a factory for low-rights creation of type .

The method creates an instance of a COM object. The implementation of IShellItem2.GetPropertyStoreWithCreateObject uses CreateObject instead of to create the property handler, which is a Shell extension, for a given file type. The property handler provides many of the important properties in the property store that this method returns.

This method is useful only if the object is created in a separate process (as a LOCALSERVER instead of an INPROCSERVER), and also if this other process has lower rights than the process calling IShellItem2.GetPropertyStoreWithCreateObject.

param.name: riid
param.para: A reference to the IID of the object to be retrieved.

param.name: ppv
param.para: When this method returns, contains the address of the requested interface pointer.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Note When this method is called on a property store for a file, that file is held open for the lifetime of the object.

summary.para: Gets the string value of a specified property key.

param.name: ppsz
param.para: A pointer to a Unicode string value.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the UInt32 value of a specified property key.

param.name: pui
param.para: Receives a pointer to a UInt32 value.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the UInt64 value of a specified property key.

param.name: pull
param.para: A pointer to a UInt64 value.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Ensures that any cached information in this item is updated.

param.name: pbc
param.para: A pointer to an interface on a bind context object.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise, including ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND if the item does not exist.

summary.para: Extends with methods that retrieve various property values of the item. IShellItem and IShellItem2 are the preferred representations of items in any new code.
